item.title: AMZN
item.description: score:-28 Chances: Amazon’s CAPEX to Exceed $50 Billion in 2023, Partly to Support AI Amazon Adds Cloud Executives, Zoox Chief to Jassyâ€™s Senior Team Like Amazon And Google, Salesforce Is Optimistic About The Remaining Half Of The Year Amazon (AMZN) Integrates Buy With Prime Into Shopify Stores This Is a Huge Win for Amazon’s Healthcare Business Risks: Apollo Tries to Salvage Amazon Aggregator Investment With Sale Walgreens CEO out, Amazon’s One Medical CEO to depart Amazon stock up $423 billion in market cap amid longest monthly winning streak since 2011 Amazon shareholder sues board, Bezos over Blue Origin launch contracts Amazon Rides High Amid Challenges In Cloud Computing, E-Commerce And FTC Probe Score:-28 investment score = chances characters count - risks characters count
